revised_title: Aldermaston Court: A New Research Laboratory for Associated Electrical Industries Ltd.
tldr: The article discusses the establishment of a new research laboratory, Aldermaston Court, for Associated Electrical Industries Ltd. The laboratory focuses on long-term research and has a strong emphasis on collaboration and training of young scientists. The article highlights some of the research programs and facilities at the laboratory, such as a 4-million volt electrostatic generator, a radioactive tracer laboratory, and a new arc furnace for metallurgical research.
